parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>0.50
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Artillery

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns true if all given units are able to fire at given position with given magazineType.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> pos '''inRangeOfArtillery''' <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>unit], magazineType]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> pos: [[Position]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>unit], magazineType]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> [unit]: [[Array]] - Array of units.

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p5</name>=<value> magazineType '''(Case Sensitive)''': [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Boolean]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_isInRange = getMarkerPos "myTarget" inRangeOfArtillery <ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>[[</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>myArty<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>, "32Rnd_155mm_Mo_shells"<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/><inner>]</inner><close></nowiki></close></ext>
</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getArtilleryAmmo]], [[commandArtilleryFire]], [[doArtilleryFire]], [[enableEngineArtillery]], [[getArtilleryComputerSettings]], [[shownArtilleryComputer]], [[getArtilleryETA]]
</value></part></template>
